title: Quarkus 2.11.1.Final and 2.10.4.Final released - Fixing CVE-2022-2466, new Redis Client API, more customization for some core extensions and more
content: Today, we released both Quarkus 2.11.1.Final and Quarkus 2.10.4.Final. Quarkus 2.11.1.Final is, despite its name, the first 2.11 release. Both versions are fixing CVE-2022-2466 in the SmallRye GraphQL server extension (for real this time). Unfortunately, the previous fix introduced in 2.10.3.Final and the non-released 2.11.0.Final was incomplete and the issue...
